attributes.action: Lets have that referendum on wether we stay in the E.U.
attributes.additional_details: It really is time to have this referendum. A lot of poeple want it,and its time we resolved this question once and for all. Call for a referendum with the question , should the u.k. withdraw from the e.u. A simple yes or no question. It will save this country billions of pounds. We will still be able to trade with Europe , i do not beleive that would not happen. We will be free to decide on our own laws, and come out of the silliness that is the human rights convention. This will enable to have our own british bill or rights.We the under signed want the coalition government to give the british poeple a referendum on wether we stay in the euroean union.
